name: You're a Wizard
description:
*Additional contributor Sevon: https://itch.io/profile/up2070314 Itch is unable to find their account so I cannot add them in at the moment.

Before playing please ensure the brower has hardware acceleration enabled  os work is offloaded to the GPU in your system. It is suggested that the game is played in fullscreen as well.

This is a game featuring a wizard, you're goal is to get the trophy as quickly as you can making your way up the tower. The basic idea is, you can turn left or right.. Which you can use to affect your potion throw, oh yeah about that.. Potion throws are what allows you to move, Wizards tend to get old and lazy walking is for smucks.. Hold space to build up a throw and on relaese you will throw your potion and land where it hits. Stay aware of the turret, as  they can affect your throwing range. Best of luck and enjoy.
